main event: A civilian aviation official provided five color movies and still color slides of flying saucers to Project 'Blue Book' at Wright-Patterson AFB, Ohio.
interesting points: The movies showed flying saucers traveling in formation at high speeds., A U.S. Navy commander believes the flying saucers are visitors from another planet., A colonel reported seeing a flying saucer in May 1948., Five trained observers used precision instruments to watch a spherical object averaging about 165 feet in diameter., There is a disagreement among military personnel regarding the origin of the flying saucers, with some attributing them to skyhook balloons.
witness description: U.S. Navy commander, colonel, and five trained observers
